name: Strength Conditioning
description: When an opponent is hit but not tackled he or she is pushed back twice as far.

name: Breakfast Club
description: Phrases longer than 8 characters make your athletes twice as strong.

name: Night Classes
description: Decreases the confused time when you make a mistake while typing a phrase by 50%

name: Bawling™ Sponsorship
description: More helmets will appear on the field each level.

name: Spare Cleats
description: Start each level with 1 set of cleats.

name: Snike™ Sponsorship
description: More cleats will appear on the field each level.

name: Loudmouth™ Sponsorship
description: More bullhorns will appear on the field each level.
